name: Mandarin Chicken
recipeCategory: easy, lunch, quick, salads and dressings
keywords: celery, cooked chicken, grapes, lemon juice, lettuce, mandarin orange, mayonnaise, poultry, slivered almonds, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 11-ounce can mandarin orange slices, drained, plus additional slices for garnish
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste Lettuce

recipeInstructions.text: Combine chicken, lemon juice, celery, onion and mayonnaise; chill.
Add almonds, orange sections and grapes; season with salt and pepper. Toss until well mixed.
Serve on lettuce leaves with additional orange sections, if desired.
